content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Aug 2019Currently, I am paying half cash and half CPF for my housing loan from POSB. After selling, I will gain less than 10k, what is the best advice?1 answerAnswerBump0

Grand MasterAnswered on 10 Sep 2019You may like to provide more details for crowdsourcing answers.For example, a $100,000 property loan for a $10k gain is quite reasonable, isn't it?$500,000?$1,000,000?You may like to share the loan amount, the tenure period, the short term and long term goal, when would you plan to sell or plan to rent out etc etc.and best advice in related to what? for refinancing? for better rental yield? for better sales pricing? for best usage of CPF? For better usage of liquidity?0 comments1
